response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value for us both. After careful consideration and evaluation, we have decided to offer this exceptional item to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a substantial investment for you, valued at $800,000, and a remarkable return on our side. We believe this price reflects the true worth of the product while providing you with an excellent opportunity to maximize its potential benefits. We look forward to discussing the details further and welcoming you as a valued member of our community.", "product_price": 1200000}
